Introduction
This topic contains
historical
information on regulations pertaining to estate limitations, including regulatory provisions
in effect prior to November 1, 2000
effective as of November 1, 2000
, and
effective as of December 27, 2001
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section H - Historical Information on Estate Limitations
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section H
